mapper.select: SELECT USERIDX, TO_CHAR(USERNAME) AS USERNAME, USERID, TO_CHAR(USERPW) AS USERPW, TO_CHAR(USERINDATE) AS USERINDATE, TO_CHAR(NVL(USERUPDATE, '-')) AS USERUPDATE FROM ACCOUNT_USER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid}
